resources.string: Thinking about a typical night in the last month…

string-array.name: sci_questions_1
string-array.item: how long does it take you to fall asleep?
if you then wake up during the night, how long are you awake for in total? (add all the wakenings up)
how many nights a week do you have a problem with your sleep?
how would you rate your sleep quality?

resources.string: Thinking about the past month, to what extent has poor sleep..

string-array.name: sci_questions_2
string-array.item: affected your mood, energy, or relationships?
affected your concentration, productivity, or ability to stay awake?

string-array.name: sci_questions_3
string-array.item: how long have you had a problem with your sleep?
